recipeInstructions.text: Prep the asparagus: Preheat the oven to 400F. Break or cut off the woody ends of the asparagus spears.
Toss with olive oil, salt, pepper, parmesan. Arrange the asparagus on a foil-lined baking sheet and coat with olive oil. Sprinkle with salt, pepper, and parmesan.
Bake at 400F until the cheese begins to brown, 8-10 minutes.
